statements: SELECT * FROM patient_feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM patient_feedback WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT feedback_id, patient_id, survey_id FROM patient_feedback WHERE survey_id = 456 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM patient_feedback;
SELECT * FROM patient_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM patient_feedback WHERE patient_id = 1001 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS feedback_count FROM patient_feedback GROUP BY patient_id HAVING feedback_count > 2;
SELECT patient_id, survey_id, feedback_date FROM patient_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY survey_id ASC, feedback_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(feedback_date) AS latest_feedback_date, MIN(feedback_date) AS earliest_feedback_date FROM patient_feedback;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE feedback_id = 'abc123';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age > 40;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating < 2 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_gender='Female';
SELECT * FROM surveys WHERE survey_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, last_visit_date FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, last_visit_date FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients, AVG(patient_age) AS avg_age FROM patients;
SELECT p.patient_name, s.overall_satisfaction, f.feedback_message FROM patients p JOIN surveys s ON p.patient_id = s.patient_id JOIN feedback f ON p.patient_id = f.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, last_visit_date FROM patients WHERE patient_age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY last_visit_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM PatientSurveyFeedback WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT survey_id, patient_id, survey_date FROM PatientSurveyFeedback ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT survey_response FROM PatientSurveyFeedback WHERE patient_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM CareQualityMetrics WHERE metric_value > 80;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name FROM CareProviders WHERE provider_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM PatientSurveyFeedback ORDER BY survey_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty FROM CareProviders;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM CareQualityMetrics WHERE metric_value > 8;
SELECT * FROM TreatmentHistory WHERE treatment_type LIKE '%surgery%' ORDER BY treatment_date;
SELECT survey_id, survey_response FROM PatientSurveyFeedback WHERE survey_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patient_records;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM patient_records ORDER BY diagnosis DESC;
SELECT patient_id, record_date FROM patient_records WHERE diagnosis='COVID-19';
SELECT record_id, diagnosis FROM patient_records WHERE record_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM care_quality_metrics WHERE metric_value > 80 ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients_survey WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT survey_questions.question_text, survey_responses.response_text FROM survey_questions JOIN survey_responses ON survey_questions.question_id = survey_responses.question_id;

SELECT patient_records.diagnosis, care_quality_metrics.metric_name, care_quality_metrics.metric_value FROM patient_records JOIN care_quality_metrics ON patient_records.record_id = care_quality_metrics.record_id;

SELECT survey_questions.question_text, survey_responses.response_text FROM survey_responses JOIN survey_questions ON survey_responses.question_id = survey_questions.question_id WHERE survey_responses.patient_id = 1;

SELECT patient_records.record_date, care_quality_metrics.metric_name, care_quality_metrics.metric_value FROM patient_records JOIN care_quality_metrics ON patient_records.record_id = care_quality_metrics.record_id WHERE patient_records.patient_id = 2;
